tasks.title: Add Scroll-Triggered Animations
tasks.description: Implement scroll-based animations that trigger when sections come into view. Use libraries like Framer Motion or AOS (Animate On Scroll) to add fade-in, slide-up, and other entrance animations to main sections (Home, About, Projects, Contact).

technicalDetails.implementation: Install framer-motion, wrap components with motion.div, add variants for animations, use useInView hook for scroll detection

tasks.title: Enhanced Project Card Hover Effects
tasks.description: Add sophisticated hover effects on project cards including color shifts, scale transformations, and shadow animations. Make the transition smooth and visually appealing with gradient overlays and glow effects.

technicalDetails.implementation: Add CSS classes with transform, box-shadow, and gradient overlay transitions. Use Tailwind utility classes for hover states.

tasks.title: Parallax Effect on Hero Section
tasks.description: Implement a subtle parallax scrolling effect on the hero section background or profile image to create depth and visual interest. Elements should move at different speeds during scroll.

technicalDetails.implementation: Use transform translateY based on scroll position, apply different rates to background and foreground elements

tasks.title: Improve Typing Animation Cursor
tasks.description: Enhance the typewriter cursor animation to make it blink more naturally and smoothly. Add custom styling to make it stand out with color and size adjustments.

technicalDetails.implementation: Customize the cursorStyle prop in Typewriter component, add CSS animations for blinking effect

tasks.title: Expand Color Palette with Accent Colors
tasks.description: Extend the current purple-to-blue gradient scheme by adding accent colors like cyan, pink, or gold for CTAs, buttons, and interactive elements. Create a cohesive color system.

technicalDetails.implementation: Add custom colors to Tailwind config, update CSS variables, apply new colors to buttons and CTAs

tasks.title: Add Dark Mode Toggle
tasks.description: Implement a theme switcher that allows users to toggle between light and dark modes. Store preference in localStorage and apply theme across all components.

technicalDetails.implementation: Install next-themes, create ThemeProvider, add toggle button in navbar, define color schemes for both modes

tasks.title: Enhance Typography Hierarchy
tasks.description: Improve the visual hierarchy by adjusting font weights, sizes, and letter-spacing. Add subtle text shadows on headings for depth and better readability.

technicalDetails.implementation: Define typography scale in Tailwind config, add custom text shadow utilities, adjust spacing and weights

tasks.title: Add Section Dividers with SVG Waves
tasks.description: Replace flat section transitions with animated SVG wave dividers. Create custom wave shapes that flow between sections for a more organic, modern look.

technicalDetails.implementation: Create reusable SVG divider component with customizable colors and wave patterns, position absolutely between sections

tasks.title: Animated Gradient Section Separators
tasks.description: Add animated gradient lines as visual separators between major sections. Use CSS animations to create flowing, dynamic borders.

technicalDetails.implementation: Create CSS keyframe animations for gradient border animation, apply to section wrappers

tasks.title: Enhanced About Section with Animated Tabs
tasks.description: Replace basic toggle buttons with smooth animated tab transitions. Add sliding indicator under active tab and fade transitions for content switching.

technicalDetails.implementation: Use framer-motion AnimatePresence for content transitions, add animated underline indicator with layoutId

tasks.title: Add Icons to Skills List
tasks.description: Include technology icons (Python, SQL, C#, etc.) next to each skill in the About section. Use icon libraries or custom SVGs for visual appeal.

technicalDetails.implementation: Import icons from react-icons/si (Simple Icons) or devicons, map skills to their corresponding icons

tasks.title: Skills Progress Bars or Rating System
tasks.description: Add visual indicators showing proficiency level for each skill. Implement animated progress bars or star ratings that animate on scroll into view.

technicalDetails.implementation: Create skill data structure with proficiency levels, animate bars from 0 to target width on scroll

tasks.title: Interactive Education Timeline
tasks.description: Enhance the education timeline with hover effects, animated connecting lines, and tooltip details. Add icons for institutions and degrees.

technicalDetails.implementation: Add hover states with scale and glow effects, animate timeline line on scroll, include date tooltips

tasks.title: Upgrade Project Cards with Technology Tags
tasks.description: Add technology badges/tags to each project card showing the tech stack used. Style them with colors representing different technologies.

technicalDetails.implementation: Extend projects data structure with technologies array, create Badge component, map technologies to colors

tasks.title: Project Card Description on Hover
tasks.description: Replace generic 'View Project' text with actual project descriptions that appear on hover. Include key features and technologies in overlay.

technicalDetails.implementation: Add description field to projects data, update overlay to show formatted description

tasks.title: Separate GitHub and Demo Link Buttons
tasks.description: Add distinct buttons for GitHub repository and live demo links instead of a single card link. Use icons for better UX and accessibility.

technicalDetails.implementation: Add button group at bottom of card, use Github and ExternalLink icons from lucide-react

tasks.title: Project Filter System
tasks.description: Implement a filtering mechanism to sort projects by technology or category. Add filter buttons with active states and smooth transitions.

technicalDetails.implementation: Create filter state, extract unique technologies from projects, animate filtered results with AnimatePresence

tasks.title: Floating Elements with Mouse Tracking
tasks.description: Add floating orbs or particles in the hero section that follow mouse movement with parallax effect. Create immersive, interactive background elements.

technicalDetails.implementation: Track mouse position with useState and event listeners, calculate parallax offset, render multiple orbs with motion.div

tasks.title: Profile Image Glow Animation
tasks.description: Add a subtle, pulsing glow or border animation around the profile image. Use gradient animations for a futuristic effect.

technicalDetails.implementation: Add CSS keyframe animation for rotating gradient border or pulsing box-shadow effect

tasks.title: Social Media Icons in Hero Section
tasks.description: Add social media icon links (LinkedIn, GitHub, Twitter, etc.) to the hero section with hover animations and tooltips.

technicalDetails.implementation: Create icon group with links, add hover effects with scale and color transitions

tasks.title: Download CV Button
tasks.description: Add a 'Download CV' button alongside the 'Ask Me Anything' button in the hero section. Style consistently with primary CTA buttons.

technicalDetails.implementation: Add button with download link to PDF resume in public folder, add download attribute

tasks.title: Animated Contact Form Fields
tasks.description: Enhance contact form with animated input fields using floating labels that move up when focused. Add focus states with gradient borders.

technicalDetails.implementation: Create custom Input component with label animation on focus, use CSS transitions for smooth movement

tasks.title: Social Media Cards in Contact Section
tasks.description: Add clickable social media cards showing different platforms with icons and hover effects in the contact section.

technicalDetails.implementation: Create card grid with social media links, add icons and hover animations

tasks.title: Toast Notifications for Form Submission
tasks.description: Implement success/error toast notifications that appear after contact form submission. Use smooth animations and auto-dismiss functionality.

technicalDetails.implementation: Install toast library, add Toaster component to layout, trigger toasts on form submission

tasks.title: Interactive Skills Radar Chart
tasks.description: Create an animated radar/spider chart visualizing skill proficiency levels. Make it interactive with hover effects showing exact values.

technicalDetails.implementation: Install charting library, create radar chart with custom styling, animate on mount

tasks.title: Custom Loading Screen
tasks.description: Create a branded loading screen that displays while the page is loading. Use logo animation and progress indicators.

technicalDetails.implementation: Create Next.js loading.js file with animated logo and spinner, add fade-out transition

tasks.title: Skeleton Loaders for Content
tasks.description: Add skeleton loading states for content sections that appear before data loads. Use shimmering effects for better UX.

technicalDetails.implementation: Create reusable Skeleton component with shimmer animation, conditionally render before data loads

tasks.title: Add Testimonials/Achievements Section
tasks.description: Create a new section showcasing certifications, awards, or client testimonials. Use card-based layout with images and quotes.

technicalDetails.implementation: Create testimonials data structure, design card component with avatar and quote styling

tasks.title: Testimonials Carousel
tasks.description: Implement a carousel/slider for testimonials section for better space utilization and user interaction. Add navigation arrows and dots.

technicalDetails.implementation: Install carousel library, configure auto-play and navigation, add custom styling

tasks.title: Enhanced Footer with Quick Navigation
tasks.description: Redesign footer to include quick navigation links, social media icons, and site map. Use multi-column layout for better organization.

technicalDetails.implementation: Restructure footer layout with grid, add navigation links with hover effects, include copyright info

tasks.title: Back to Top Button
tasks.description: Add a floating 'Back to Top' button that appears when scrolling down. Include smooth scroll animation and fade-in/out transitions.

technicalDetails.implementation: Create button component, track scroll position, show/hide based on scroll threshold, add smooth scroll on click

tasks.title: Footer Social Media Links
tasks.description: Add social media icon links to the footer with hover effects. Use consistent styling with other social elements.

technicalDetails.implementation: Add icon links with hover scale and color transitions

tasks.title: Improve Keyboard Navigation
tasks.description: Enhance keyboard navigation throughout the site. Add visible focus indicators and ensure all interactive elements are accessible via keyboard.

technicalDetails.implementation: Add focus-visible styles, ensure proper tab order, test with keyboard-only navigation

tasks.title: Add ARIA Labels and Semantic HTML
tasks.description: Improve accessibility by adding appropriate ARIA labels, roles, and using semantic HTML5 elements throughout the site.

technicalDetails.implementation: Add aria-label, aria-describedby, role attributes, replace divs with semantic elements

tasks.title: Loading States for Chatbot
tasks.description: Add loading indicators when chatbot is processing requests. Show typing animation or spinner for better user feedback.

technicalDetails.implementation: Add loading state, create typing dots animation, show while waiting for response

tasks.title: Responsive Image Optimization
tasks.description: Optimize all images using Next.js Image component with proper sizes, quality settings, and lazy loading. Add blur placeholders.

technicalDetails.implementation: Replace img tags with Next.js Image, add placeholder='blur', optimize sizes for responsive breakpoints

tasks.title: Mobile Menu Animation Enhancement
tasks.description: Improve mobile hamburger menu with smooth slide-in animation and overlay backdrop. Add close animation when clicking outside.

technicalDetails.implementation: Add AnimatePresence for menu transitions, create backdrop overlay, detect outside clicks

tasks.title: Implement Bento Grid Layout
tasks.description: Transform the traditional vertical scroll layout into a modern Bento Grid (modular grid-based layout inspired by bento boxes and Apple's design). Break bio, skills, social links, location, and GitHub activity into different sized rectangular cards arranged in a visually organized grid. This creates a more dynamic and contemporary portfolio feel compared to standard vertical sections.

technicalDetails.implementation: Create responsive grid system with CSS Grid or react-grid-layout, design modular card components for different content types (bio, skills, location, GitHub stats), implement different card sizes and positions, add hover animations for depth

tasks.title: Video Demo on Project Card Hover
tasks.description: Replace static project images with auto-playing video demos that trigger on hover. For 'Object detection application' and other projects, use short mp4/webm videos showing the actual functionality instead of screenshots. This provides immediate visual proof of working projects.

technicalDetails.implementation: Add video field to projects data structure, use HTML5 video element with autoPlay/muted/loop, show video on hover with smooth transition from static image, optimize videos for web (compress, convert to webm)

tasks.title: Tech Stack Tooltips with Library Details
tasks.description: Add interactive tooltips that appear when hovering over skills (Python, NLP, SQL, etc.) showing specific libraries and frameworks used. For example, Python tooltip shows 'TensorFlow, Pandas, Scikit-learn, NumPy'. This provides deeper insight into technical expertise without cluttering the main interface.

technicalDetails.implementation: Install tooltip library, create skills data structure with sub-libraries array, implement tooltip component with enter/exit animations, style with dark background and arrow pointer

tasks.title: Spotlight Cursor Effect on Project Cards
tasks.description: Add a subtle radial gradient spotlight that follows the mouse cursor when hovering over project cards. The spotlight creates depth and draws attention to the area under the cursor, making the interface feel more interactive and premium.

technicalDetails.implementation: Track mouse position on card using onMouseMove event, calculate relative position within card, apply radial gradient CSS using CSS variables updated via JavaScript, use transform for GPU acceleration

tasks.title: Case Study Modals for Projects
tasks.description: Implement detailed case study modals/drawers that slide out when project cards are clicked. Instead of immediately leaving the site, users see structured information: The Problem → The Tech Stack → The Solution → The Outcome. This format is crucial for Data Science portfolios where methodology matters as much as the final product. Keeps recruiters engaged on your site longer.

technicalDetails.implementation: Extend projects data with detailed case study fields (problem, techStack, solution, outcome, challenges, results), create modal component with smooth slide-in animation, design structured layout with sections and visual hierarchy, add image carousel for project screenshots

tasks.title: Command Palette Navigation (Cmd+K)
tasks.description: Implement a command palette that opens with Cmd+K (Ctrl+K on Windows) allowing users to instantly jump to sections like Projects, Resume, Contact, or search for specific skills. This developer-focused UX pattern is trending in modern web apps and portfolios. Eventually can be enhanced with AI to answer questions about your experience.

technicalDetails.implementation: Install command palette library (cmdk or kbar), define actions for navigation (sections, download CV, social links), implement keyboard shortcut detection, design fuzzy search functionality, style with glassmorphism effect

tasks.title: Interactive Data Visualizations
tasks.description: Since you specialize in Data Science, showcase this through interactive visualizations. Add a live chart (using D3.js or Recharts) displaying personal coding stats like commit history, hours coded over time, or contribution patterns. This could be placed in the hero section, footer, or as a dedicated Bento Grid card. Demonstrates your data visualization skills while personalizing the portfolio.

technicalDetails.implementation: Fetch GitHub data via API (commits, contributions), process data for visualization, create responsive chart components (line chart for commits, heatmap for contributions), animate on scroll into view, add interactive hover states with tooltips

tasks.title: Brutalist Typography Design System
tasks.description: Evolve the typography beyond the current safe choices. Implement a brutalist-inspired design system with high-contrast, large serif fonts for headings (like 'Data Scientist') paired with monospace fonts (JetBrains Mono, Fira Code) for body text to create a 'code editor' aesthetic. This makes the portfolio feel more distinctive and aligned with developer culture.

technicalDetails.implementation: Import large serif font for headings (Playfair Display, Fraunces, or Space Grotesk), add monospace font for body/code, define typography scale with dramatic size jumps, implement high contrast color combinations, add brutalist design elements (thick borders, asymmetric layouts)

tasks.title: RAG-Powered AI Chat Widget
tasks.description: Transform the existing 'Ask Me Anything' chatbot into an advanced RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) system that allows recruiters to 'chat with your resume'. The system should be trained on your projects, skills, education, and experience to answer questions intelligently. This is a powerful demonstration of your actual NLP and AI capabilities, turning your portfolio into an interactive showcase of your technical expertise.

technicalDetails.implementation: Create embeddings from your resume, projects, and portfolio content; set up vector database for retrieval; implement RAG pipeline with LangChain or LlamaIndex; use OpenAI/Anthropic API for generation; add context management and conversation history; design enhanced chat UI with streaming responses; implement rate limiting and caching for cost efficiency

tasks.title: Scrollytelling for Project Showcases
tasks.description: Implement scrollytelling (scroll-based storytelling) for key projects where content and animations are triggered by scroll position. As users scroll through a project case study, different elements (images, code snippets, metrics) appear with coordinated animations creating a narrative experience. This is particularly effective for explaining complex Data Science projects with multiple stages.

technicalDetails.implementation: Install scroll animation library (GSAP ScrollTrigger or use framer-motion with intersection observer), design scroll sections with pinned/animated elements, coordinate animations with scroll progress, implement progressive content reveal, add scroll indicators
